
---
title: 'Redmi K50 电竞版上架：骁龙 8 Gen 1 加持，120W 秒充 + 4700mAh 电池'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/2/9572db18-6ccd-439c-8eea-f5d6ad1ccc4c.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Fri, 11 Feb 2022 00:01:45 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/2/9572db18-6ccd-439c-8eea-f5d6ad1ccc4c.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="5d30"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 2 月 11 日消息，Redmi K50 电竞版是 Redmi K50 系列的首发机型，<span class="accentTextColor">将于 2 月 16 日正式发布</span>。该机现已上架电商平台并开启预约。</p><p data-vmark="d047" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/2/9572db18-6ccd-439c-8eea-f5d6ad1ccc4c.png" w="1440" h="704" alt="Redmi K50电竞版上架" title="Redmi K50 电竞版上架：骁龙 8 Gen 1 加持，120W 秒充 + 4700mAh 电池" width="1440" height="401" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="27d2">IT之家了解到，Redmi K50 电竞版<span class="accentTextColor">搭载骁龙 8 Gen 1 处理器</span>，拥有 4860mm² VC 散热总面积，<span class="accentTextColor">支持 120W 快充</span>，全球首发搭载 CyberEngine 超宽频马达。</p><p data-vmark="292c"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/2/6bb64cc7-8ea3-4cfb-a1cd-577915f5baad.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_615" alt="Redmi K50 电竞版官方海报" title="Redmi K50 电竞版上架：骁龙 8 Gen 1 加持，120W 秒充 + 4700mAh 电池" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="f7a5">设计方面，Redmi K50 电竞版采用光哑同体工艺，拥有 X 型立体切割音量键、CD 纹工艺肩键开关，同时配备全金属边框与 3D 微收弧，使手感更顺滑。</p><p data-vmark="7e40"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/2/bdfe3dbf-6bbe-44e1-a30a-bee5062e2581.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_1093" w="1440" h="1920" alt="Redmi K50 电竞版官方海报" title="Redmi K50 电竞版上架：骁龙 8 Gen 1 加持，120W 秒充 + 4700mAh 电池" srcset="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/2/bdfe3dbf-6bbe-44e1-a30a-bee5062e2581.jpg 2x" width="1440" height="1093" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="e5c4">卢伟冰曾表示，本次发布会先发布“K50 电竞版”。电竞版的定位是“K 系列巅峰性能旗舰”，并不是严格意义的电竞手机，而是“全能旗舰 + 电竞特长”。此外，标准版、天玑版等还在打磨中，会稍晚出场。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOsJK1olXQ4LXFxZCkwWBl8IGloUXwUEVl1VD0wnRzBQRQQlBENHFRxWFlVPRjtUBABAQlRcCEBdCUoWAWwOGVgdWgEdDRsBVXtvY25fcFhdCWR-KgUFVi1JXy99Hy51UQoyVFxdAEgWC24KGGsWXwEAUlpYC0wnYAhmRwIRIFlZLhxtCEonQQHcmuXD3YTV7OSKpcDPt9PdkdwlXQUFUFxYAEsXB18IHF4QWQQEUV1cAUgVM28AHGtJH1RDFm5tOEgnM18IK1glA2gDB1hfCEhDBwFSUAJKWFUBDDBdDksfB2wKHlwlXwcDVlxt" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=/pages/union/proxy/proxy?spreadUrl=https%3a%2f%2funion-click.jd.com%2fjdc%3fe%3d%26p%&EA_PTAG=17078.27.380" data-jdid="100032732966"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/214470/18/12057/256075/62027802E55002d2e/86d6f2d5f245b551.jpg" title="Redmi K50 电竞版上架：骁龙 8 Gen 1 加持，120W 秒充 + 4700mAh 电池" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name"> Redmi K50 电竞版</span></span><span </div>
